text: This is a list of named geological features on Mimas, a moon that orbits the planet Saturn. Mimantean features are named after people and places in Arthurian legend or the legends of the Titans. The sole exception to this is Herschel Crater, named after William Herschel, the astronomer who discovered Mimas in 1789. That name was chosen before the International Astronomical Union set a guideline for naming geological features on Mimas. ==Chasms== Mimas' chasmata are named after locations in Arthurian legend and the legends of the Titans. {| class="wikitable" ! Chasma !! Named after !! Pronounced |- | Avalon Chasma || Avalon || |- | Camelot Chasma || Camelot || |- | Oeta Chasma || Oeta || |- | Ossa Chasma || Ossa || |- | Pangea Chasma || Pangea || |- | Pelion Chasma || Pelion || |} ==Craters== With the exception of Herschel, the craters of Mimas are named after characters in Arthurian legend. {| class="wikitable" ! Crater !! Named after !! Pronounced |- | Accolon || Accolon || |- | Arthur || King Arthur || |- | Balin || Sir Balin || |- | Ban || King Ban || |- | Bedivere || Bedivere || |- | Bors || Bors || |- | Dagonet || Dagonet || |- | Dynas || Dinas Emrys || |- | Elaine || Elaine || |- | Gaheris || Gaheris || |- | Galahad || Galahad || |- | Gareth || Gareth || |- | Gawain || Gawain || |- | Gwynevere || Guinevere || |- | Herschel || William Herschel || |- | Igraine || Igraine || |- | Iseult || Iseult || |- | Kay || Sir Kay || |- | Lamerok || Lamerok || |- | Launcelot || Launcelot || |- | Lot || Lot || |- | Lucas || Sir Lucan || |- | Marhaus || Morholt || |- | Mark || Mark of Cornwall || |- | Melyodas || Meliodas || |- | Merlin || Merlin || |- | Modred || Mordred || |- | Morgan || Morgan le Fay || |- | Nero || Nero || |- | Palomides || Palomides || |- | Pellinore || Pellinore || |- | Percivale || Percivale || |- | Royns || Rience || |- | Tristram || Tristram || |- | Uther || Uther Pendragon || |} ==Crater chains== Mimas's sole named catena is named after a location in Arthurian legend. {| class="wikitable" ! Catena !! Named after !! Pronounced !! Note |- | Tintagil Catena || Tintagel || || formerly Tintagil Chasma |} ==External links== * USGS: Mimas nomenclature Category:Mimas (moon) Mimas (moon) Mimas
title: List of geological features on Mimas
